meta.name: Britons In Hong Kong
meta.about:
Welcome to the ONLY channel of Britons in Hong Kong.

Members of Britons in Hong Kong (BHK) noticed the inequality of BN(O) and have been following this issue and hence founded BHK during the Anti-ELAB movement. With more than 7,500 subscribers on Telegram, we focus on advocating the right for BN(O)s and speaking up for Hong Kong British Nationals’ human rights, including their descendants. 

Since September this year, we have held multiple gatherings outside British Consulate Hong Kong, respectively 1/9  'Equal rights to British nationals in Hong Kong',  15/9 'One Country Two Systems is dead' and 1/10 'Not My National Day'. On 23 October, we organised 2,000 people human chain to support the debate on Hong Kong people’s second citizenship in the House of Lords.

Please find us through: 

FB: http://fb.me/britonshk
TG: https://t.me/britonsinhk
Email: britonsinhk@gmail.com
